data.name: Biotech Samurai
data.detailed_description:
Check Out Other Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1644650/Defense_Tower_Simulator/?beta=0
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1439170/Smart_Thief/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1366840/Moon_Farming/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355970/Jungle_House/

You lost everything in your life - your body, your skin and even your voice! Welcome to Biotech Samurai - a third person swordplay game in cyberpunk style. You need to find who did that to you and come with full vendetta!

We were inspired by samurai and cyberpunk games and Biotech Samurai was created by ONE MAN ONLY!!!

Key Features:

- Very difficult
- Great environment worlds using Unreal engine!
- Fearsome enemies
- Big-bosses
- Cool samurai animations for attacks
- And more...

data.short_description: You lost everything in your life - your body, your skin and even your voice! Welcome to Biotech Samurai - a third person swordplay game in cyberpunk style. You need to find who did that to you and come with full vendetta!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence with swords fights without blood
